channel.title: sorting on Algoclub
channel.description: Recent content in sorting on Algoclub

item.title: Top 6 the most important sorting algorithms in the world
item.description: Ho-ho-ho! Today we are going to take a look at THE MOST IMPORTANT SORTING ALGORITHMS IN THE WORLD!!!!1 You know, it is really hard to underestimate sorting algorithms. They are that much important as the sorting hat in Hogwarts! So, we will start from the famous BogoSort! 1. Bogosort The algorithm consists of two steps: Shuffle the array Check if this permutation is sorted So, I always imagine that this algorithm like a clown who put all the permutations in the box.
